data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Warwick who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Warwick, Bermuda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 2,380 believers in the state of Warwick to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Warwick, Bermuda to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Warwick.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 2,380 believers living in Warwick, Bermuda.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Warwick to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Warwick, Bermuda.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Warwick, Bermuda has a population of 9,100.

We estimate Warwick has 2,380 people who might know Jesus, 5,962 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 759 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
